code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./Greeting.scss";import emoji from"react-easy-emoji";import SocialMedia from"../../components/socialMedia/SocialMedia";import Button from"../../components/button/Button";import{greeting}from"../../portfolio";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import FadeIn from"../../components/fadeIn/FadeIn";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Greeting(){const{isDark}=useContext(StyleContext);if(!greeting.displayGreeting){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FadeIn,{yOffset:40,duration:1,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"greet-main",id:"greeting",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"greeting-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"greeting-text-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:isDark?"dark-mode greeting-text":"greeting-text",children:[greeting.title," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"wave-emoji",children:emoji("ðŸ‘‹")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isDark?"dark-mode greeting-text-p":"greeting-text-p subTitle",children:greeting.subTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"resume",className:"empty-div"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SocialMedia,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-greeting-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{text:"Contact me",href:"#contact"}),greeting.resumeLink&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{download:"Fernando - Resume.pdf",className:"download-link-button",href:"/resume.pdf?cache-bust="+new Date().getTime(),text:"Download my resume"})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"greeting-image-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:require("../../assets/images/profilePicture.png"),alt:"profile"})})]})})});}
